titles.title: Veterans Readjustment Appointments Reauthorization Act of 2000
To amend title 38, United States Code, to reauthorize the program for veterans readjustment appointments within the Federal Government.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 7/24/2000--Introduced. Veterans Readjustment Appointments Reauthorization Act of 2000 - Allows certain veterans to receive veterans readjustment appointments within the Federal Government only within the ten- year period following the later of: (1) the date of their last discharge or release from active duty; or (2) the enactment date of this Act (currently, December 31, 1995).
